uk.autores.format

Class FormatVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.autores.format.FormatSegment
      • uk.autores.format.FormatVariable

  • public final class FormatVariable
extends FormatSegment
    Represents indexed variable expression like {1,number,currency}.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int index()
      Ordinal of the argument used to populate this variable.
      String raw()
      String segment from the source expression.
      FormatStyle style()
      FormatStyle.NONE if not specified in the expression.
      String subformat()
      Populated when FormatStyle.SUBFORMAT is detected.
      FormatType type()
      FormatType.NONE if not specified in the expression.

      • Methods inherited from class uk.autores.format.FormatSegment

        equals, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public int index()
        Ordinal of the argument used to populate this variable.
        Returns:
        zero-based index

      • type

        public FormatType type()
        FormatType.NONE if not specified in the expression.
        Returns:
        number, date, time, choice or (none)

      • style

        public FormatStyle style()
        FormatStyle.NONE if not specified in the expression. FormatStyle.SUBFORMAT if not a match for FormatType.styles().
        Returns:
        format type specific style

      • subformat

        public String subformat()
        Populated when FormatStyle.SUBFORMAT is detected.
        Returns:
        sub-format pattern or empty string

      • raw

        public String raw()
        Description copied from class: FormatSegment
        String segment from the source expression.
        Returns:
        original string
